text: Ni shuo:`Xinfeng tian jing de ren a! Nimen lai ba, rang women gongtong zunshou yizhong shuangfang renwei gongping de xintiao: Women dajia zhi chongbai zhenzhu, bu yi renhe wu pei ta, chu zhenzhu wai, bu yi tonglei wei zhuzai.'Ruguo tamen beiqi zhe zhong xintiao, namo, nimen shuo:`Qing nimen zuo zheng women shi guishun de ren.
